Title: {{w|CAVES OF }}{{rainbow|QUOLOR}} {{r|+}} {{prismatic|QUONTAINERS}}
Description: Adds a splash of color to normally statically-hued objects, and reveals a few normally hidden secondary colors of tiles. Added new tiles for a few characters and things - more accurate depiction or QoL.  New liquid containers, and containers now show whether full or empty.  MANY AUTHORS = helado, Angry Static, cantorsdust, Plutovi, Jak(i), Rabbit, CatlikeSpectator, alividlife
